alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:33AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sedgwick, Harper, southeastern Kingman and western Sumner Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1232 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Pretty Prairie to 11 miles south of Kingman to Nashville. Movement was south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goddard, Clearwater, Anthony, Harper, Colwich, Conway Springs, Caldwell, Garden Plain, Attica, Argonia, Viola, Mayfield, Milan, Bluff City, Danville, Waldron, Freeport, Perth, Corwin and Lake Afton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
